channel.title: Tom Tian on
channel.description: Recent content in Tom Tian on

item.title: Summertime
item.description: I love summers. Despite having many mannerism of your sterotypical CS student, I still love the great weather and being outdoors.

item.title: Adulting is hard
item.description: Almost missed to file my taxes because I forgot when the USPS office closed - Tom Tian April 15th 2025

item.title: Small Talks: A New Year Resolution
item.description: As I make my annual/bi-annual trek back up to Canada, I had the opportunity to meet many friends (not much family since they are all in China).

item.title: Fall Fatigue Strikes Again
item.description: Every year during the fall, I go into hibernation for at least two weeks. This usually happens during before or after halloween and has happened every year since I went into highschool.

item.title: Trying to Understand "In the Era" Hype In the Era of 2024 Research
item.description: [!Warning] Views are My Own I am not an experienced researcher in any capacity. These are just some personal thoughts.

item.title: A Reflection of My Past Two Years: Grad School Edition
item.description: Picture taken when I accidentally went to the freshman orientation [!Tip] Why am I writing this It’s been a while since I updated my personal website.

item.title: Yet Another Post on Graduate School Admissions
item.description: [!warning] Disclaimer I am by no means an expert on graduate school admissions and this post is not meant to provide a complete a guide on how the admission process works.
